messages.message:
Hey all, I'm working on some changes related to executing AWS Lambdas, with this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67093/files). I'm trying to figure out how to test it and was wondering if I could get some help.
So far, I tried recompiling everything on crafting and running it but it doesn't seem to hit the code (tested with print statements above where we're assigning secrets to `SafeString`). Instead, I provisioned a new sandbox on https://sandbox.console.instabase.com/sandbox in 2 ways (difference being platform vs aihub). In both ways, the following advanced params were present when creating the tenant.
```{
"IS_ST_AIHUB": "False",
"ENABLE_LAMBDA":"True"
}```
In platform one, I cannot seem to access AIHub which seems to be expected? - https://redact-secret.internal.instabase.com/
In AIHub, Argo CD fails but I cannot pinpoint where it's failing. The endpoints are still up so I can create a project, but the secret value is not redacted.

Here are the repro steps:
1. Create a secret on AIHub (/settings/secrets)
2. Create a project on AIHub
3. Add a validation UDF, and add secrets in the UDF (Show Keys > Secrets > Add Secret)
4. Print the secret (`print(keys['secrets']['alias'])`)
5. See redacted in UDF Logs instead of secret value assigned in step 1 - this doesn't work and want to debug why
cc @raman.goel
